Vishranti - A Doon Valley Resort & Spa is located on a private estate which has an illustrious cricketing legacy, now open to visitors who desire a getaway from urban life into the midst of nature. The cottage-suites are designed in the style of a colonial country bungalow, with sloping roofs and wide verandas from where one can enjoy serene views of the many acres of Sal forest, organic farms and the surrounding hills. Each room is air-conditioned, individually designed, elegantly furnished with beautifully restored period furniture, and decorated with antique fittings and rare paintings. Its 23-acre organic farm is acclaimed for its farming practices and guests even have the option of choosing their own vegetables.
9.0 Superb
Vishranti Resort Dehradun
  Dehradun ( Village Lower Kandoli, Pachwadoon, Prem Nagar )
Close to selected area
 168 km    2 hrs 55 mins  
Vishranti - A Doon Valley Resort & Spa is located on a private estate which has an illustrious cricketing legacy, now open to visitors who desire a getaway from urban life into the midst of nature. The cottage-suites are designed in the style of a colonial country bungalow, with sloping roofs and wide verandas from where one can enjoy serene views of the many acres of Sal forest, organic farms and the surrounding hills. Each room is air-conditioned, individually designed, elegantly furnished with beautifully restored period furniture, and decorated with antique fittings and rare paintings. Its 23-acre organic farm is acclaimed for its farming practices and guests even have the option of choosing their own vegetables.

The 14th century Hill-Fort, Kesroli is one of the oldest heritages site in India. Situated atop the dark Hornstone Breccia rocks, it commands splendid agrarian views from its ramparts and makes an ideal base to visit the neighbouring palaces, museums and sanctuaries of Alwar and Sariska.

Alsisar Haveli brings back to life the grandeur of the old days and is a memorable regal Rajasthani experience for the guests. Refurbished in 1982, the Haveli incorporates the finesse of traditional Rajput architecture and is a site to behold. A path leads through an immaculate garden to a large elevated platform that dominates the central area of the ground floor. It is open to guests who can witness puppet shows and folk dances while staying here.
